title: Traveling Set And Case, early 17th century
medium: Mother-of-pearl, steel, leather, gilding, cotton cord
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Small case for six implements, stamped leather with scrolled decoration in gold. Case consists of two parts, body and lid, held together with a cord.

tombstone.epitaph:
Traveling Set And Case, early 17th century.
early 17th century. Mother-of-pearl, steel, leather, gilding, cotton cord. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-253-a/g.
